r.s: Generates HTML menus from multidimensional hashes.
r.d: With the HTML_Menu class one can easily create and maintain a navigation structure for websites, configuring it via a multidimensional hash structure. Different modes for the HTML output are supported.
r.n:
Fixed bug #5635: do not try to use non-scalar fields of menu node in str_replace() call in Direct and DirectTree renderers
Implemented request #2935: moved duplicate code into _prefixUrl() method Implemented request #3237: added forceCurrentIndex() method Implemented request #4391: a tree branch is expanded in 'tree' output if the node contains 'forceExpand' field
